allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge main into seo/critical-fixes and address review feedback

- Fix sitemap homepage matching: use exact URL path comparison instead of
  endsWith\(''/''\) which matched all trailing-slash URLs \(High severity\)
- Fix canonical URL double-slash: strip trailing slash from siteUrl instead
  of pathname, which was the actual source of the // junction \(Medium severity\)
- Fix footer tool count: update "50+" to "60+" for consistency \(Low severity\)
- Resolve merge conflicts in astro.config.mjs and src/lib/i18n.ts
- Update hero.description from "50+" to "60+" in both en/ja i18n strings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: start dev server before Lighthouse CI

The Lighthouse CI step was failing with CHROME_INTERSTITIAL_ERROR because
no server was running at localhost:4321. Since this is an SSR project
\(output: ''server'' with Vercel adapter\), the build step alone doesn''t
create serveable static files. Added a step to start the dev server and
wait for it to be ready before running Lighthouse.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
